ygData.subject: Re: Somethin seems wrong (long response)
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes Jewelry craft is really cool, yes its profitable, later on, but up until say your at a skill of 120 plus its a very big, very very deep black hole in which
ygData.messageBody:
Yes Jewelry craft is really cool, yes its profitable, later on, but up
until say your at a skill of 120 plus its a very big, very very deep
black hole in which to throw your pp. and the gods pity you if you are
not an enchanter trying to do this craft.
/Nosferatu aka Phebos gnome enchantress

XxKommiexX@... wrote:
>
> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> Your on a different server. Yes, if I had a enchanter, I would try jewercraft
> as well. I should have done it, but I didn't. Don't feel like trying to get
> master smith again. Jewelcraft seems really cool. Lots of fun. Just wish I
> had made an enchanter.
